Source.Contents:
/#
   An exchange traded equity asset.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.EquityAsset {
  # Identification of the underlying asset, using public and/or private identifiers.
  instrumentId : string

  # Long name of the underlying asset.
  description : string?

  # Trading currency of the underlyer when transacted as a cash instrument.
  currency : string?

  # Identification of the exchange on which this asset is transacted for the purposes of calculating a contractural payoff. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
  exchangeId : string?

  # Identification of the clearance system associated with the transaction exchange.
  clearanceSystem : string?

  # An optional reference to a full FpML product that defines the simple product in greater detail. In case of inconsistency between the terms of the simple product and those of the detailed definition, the values in the simple product override those in the detailed definition.
  definition : FpML5.confirmation.ProductReference?

  # A short form unique identifier for a related exchange. If the element is not present then the exchange shall be the primary exchange on which listed futures and options on the underlying are listed. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
  relatedExchangeId : string?

  # A short form unique identifier for an exchange on which the reference option contract is listed. This is to address the case where the reference exchange for the future is different than the one for the option. The options Exchange is referenced on share options when Merger Elections are selected as Options Exchange Adjustment.
  optionsExchangeId : string?

  # A short form unique identifier for a specified exchange. If the element is not present then the exchange shall be default terms as defined in the MCA; unless otherwise specified in the Transaction Supplement.
  specifiedExchangeId : string?

  id : string?

}

instrumentId.Doc: Identification of the underlying asset, using public and/or private identifiers.
instrumentId.Name: instrumentId

description.Doc: Long name of the underlying asset.
description.Name: description

currency.Doc: Trading currency of the underlyer when transacted as a cash instrument.
currency.Name: currency

exchangeId.Name: exchangeId

clearanceSystem.Doc: Identification of the clearance system associated with the transaction exchange.
clearanceSystem.Name: clearanceSystem

definition.Doc: An optional reference to a full FpML product that defines the simple product in greater detail. In case of inconsistency between the terms of the simple product and those of the detailed definition, the values in the simple product override those in the detailed definition.
definition.Name: definition

relatedExchangeId.Doc: A short form unique identifier for a related exchange. If the element is not present then the exchange shall be the primary exchange on which listed futures and options on the underlying are listed. The term "Exchange" is assumed to have the meaning as defined in the ISDA 2002 Equity Derivatives Definitions.
relatedExchangeId.Name: relatedExchangeId

optionsExchangeId.Doc: A short form unique identifier for an exchange on which the reference option contract is listed. This is to address the case where the reference exchange for the future is different than the one for the option. The options Exchange is referenced on share options when Merger Elections are selected as Options Exchange Adjustment.
optionsExchangeId.Name: optionsExchangeId

specifiedExchangeId.Doc: A short form unique identifier for a specified exchange. If the element is not present then the exchange shall be default terms as defined in the MCA; unless otherwise specified in the Transaction Supplement.
specifiedExchangeId.Name: specifiedExchangeId
